about_the_game:
Welcome to Frieseria!

The first ever restaurant serving... fries! That's right, it is back!

After a year of shutdown, Frieseria is back better than ever, to fulfill its guests demands. At least, that's what it should be about, but you decide.
Play as the place's employee and deliver a variety of fries, while exploring the wacky world of the game.

Gameplay

Frieseria aims to provide a cozy, yet sometimes fast-paced gameplay flow with its zany direction and atmospheric art style.

- Treat guests
- Grating Station: Select the potato & fry types, and grate a sufficient amount of fries to match the order criteria!
- Frying Station: Put the fries into the frying baskets and transfer them to the next station once the frying degree is correct.
- Toppings Station: Add solid toppings like bacon, sprinkleables like salt or sauces like ketchup! Make sure nothing runs out of stock (if it does, be creative)!
- Collect tips
- Upgrade your restaurant to make it a more appealing place for the customers

Continuous progression

You unlock new toppings and tools as you move forward to expand your toolset! You can keep track of your achievements, which will provide even more unlockables later on!

Variety

Characters are procedurally generated, and so are their orders. You get to apply every single topping, making versatile fries & paying attention to their shape as well as frying time!

Customization

You can design your own character, instead of using the premade ones. As you serve orders, you will gain tips which also let you decorate the restaurant or enhance the kitchen equipment. Each purchase comes with extras, so be aware of that!
